description: This file implements an in-memory version of the NoteRepository interface, used for managing Note objects. It provides methods for creating, retrieving, updating, deleting, and searching notes within an in-memory list, primarily for development or testing purposes.

classes.name: InMemoryNoteRepository
classes.description: A class implementing NoteRepository that stores notes in memory for development and testing.

methods.name: getAll
methods.description: Returns all notes sorted for display.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Fetches a note by its ID, returning null if not found.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new note with a unique ID and current timestamps, and adds it to the collection.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note; if not found, creates it.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note by ID and returns the number of notes deleted.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Searches notes based on a query string.
